tool.name: ANGMAP
tool.description: <br/>This tool computes the acute angle raster between the topographic surface defined by slope and aspect rasters internally derived from input elevation raster, and a structural plane defined by diop direction- and dip grids. Optionally, the dip direction and dip of the cutting line linears between the two planes can be calculated<br/>Reference: <a href="http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0098300403000864">Günther, A. (2003). SLOPEMAP: programs for automated mapping of geometrical and kinematical properties of hard rock hill slopes. Computers & Geosciences, 29, 865 - 875</a>.<br/>

param.name: C
param.label: Dip grid (degrees)
param.help: A grid representing the dip of the structure plane (in degrees)

param.name: D
param.label: Dip direction grid (degrees)
param.help: A grid representing the dip direction of the structure plane (in degrees)

param.name: fB
param.label: Global structure dip (degrees)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fC
param.label: Global structure dip direction (degrees)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set
